commit.message:
7904124: JOL: Correct mark header size for Lilliput V2 in object internals

Before:
```
java.lang.String object internals:
OFF  SZ      TYPE DESCRIPTION               VALUE
  0   8           (object header: mark)     0x0036449200bc8001 (Lilliput)
  4   4       int String.hash               3556498
```

After:
```
java.lang.String object internals:
OFF  SZ      TYPE DESCRIPTION               VALUE
  0   4           (object header: mark)     0x00bc8001 (Lilliput)
  4   4       int String.hash               3556498
```

ModelVM naively uses the address size as the mark header size, but
that's not valid for Lilliput V2. Use object header size minus class
header size instead (both of these are implemented for Lilliput V2).
